Term.Comment: Identifier of the upper layer protocol
Count of IP datagrams that are fragmented
The fragment-offset value from fragmented IP packets
The Fragmentation properties indicated by flags in the IPv4 packet header or the IPv6 Fragment header, respectively
Identification field in the IPv4 packet header or in the IPv6 Fragment header
The Time to Live (TTL) field in the IP packet
The value of the Next Header field of the IPv6 header
This value encodes the 6 bits of the Differentiated Services field
The IP Precedence value is encoded in the first 3 bits of the IPv4 TOS field or the IPv6 Traffic Class field, respectively.
The length of the IP packet excluding lower layer encapsulations
